verses.name: Exodus 36:9
verses.text: The length of one curtain was twenty and eight cubits, and the breadth of one curtain four cubits: the curtains were all of one size.

verses.name: Exodus 36:10
verses.text: And he coupled the five curtains one unto another: and the other five curtains he coupled one unto another.

verses.name: Exodus 36:11
verses.text: And he made loops of blue on the edge of one curtain from the selvedge in the coupling: likewise he made in the uttermost side of another curtain, in the coupling of the second.
